author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO NOW MOVING TO THE WEST-NORTHWEST WELL TO THE EAST-SOUTHEAST OF HAWAII...
summary: ...KIKO NOW MOVING TO THE WEST-NORTHWEST WELL TO THE EAST-SOUTHEAST OF HAWAII... As of 5:00 AM HST Fri Sep 05 the center of Kiko was located near 14.2, -137.1 with movement WNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 962 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO NOW MOVING TO THE WEST-NORTHWEST WELL TO THE EAST-SOUTHEAST OF HAWAII... As of 5:00 AM HST Fri Sep 05 the center of Kiko was located near 14.2, -137.1 with movement WNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 962 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (EP1/EP112025)
